descriptionMdByRank.1: Casting the Resonance Skill grants **6** Resonance Energy and increases ATK by **10%**, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: Casting the Resonance Skill grants **7** Resonance Energy and increases ATK by **12.5%**, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: Casting the Resonance Skill grants **8** Resonance Energy and increases ATK by **15%**, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: Casting the Resonance Skill grants **9** Resonance Energy and increases ATK by **17.5%**, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: Casting the Resonance Skill grants **10** Resonance Energy and increases ATK by **20%**, lasting for 16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.
